release.action: Web interface released.
Over/Under budget value error fixed
Debits and credits broken out into separate columns.
Startup script modified for Mac OSX distribution to address SWT startup issue.
Recurring transactions feature added.
Reports can be saved, including table data and charts, to a self contained html file.
Accounts can be added/removed from budgets.
Binary distribution available for Mac.
Fixed bug in import. Accounts with account id = zero were being skipped.
SWT updated to version 3.5.2
New Account History Report with bar chart.
Weekly Budget and Weekly Avg columns added to budget view.
SWT updated to version 3.5.1
Database is embedded now.
When setting up accounts you can now select from a list of defaults.
Account offset selections remembered between transaction imports.
Right click menu on tree works for all nodes now.
Toolbar button clean up unused buttons put to use or removed.
Reports redesigned with added charts.
Incorrect monthly over/under on budget view fixed.
Icons added to tree. Budget category moved to top.
Date entry boxes now have a drop down date control.
New report showing account balances for the prior month.
Button added to the budget view to allow you to save a budget to all months.
On Linux you do not have to execute two scripts anymore to load the application and the database now closes also when you exit.
This release adds colored reports using the BIRT (www.eclipse.org/birt/)
Added a liability account type.
Added total income, total liabilities, and total expenses to the budget view.
All amounts in app are formatted using #,###.##:(#,###.##) format.
Added upgrade procedures to automatically apply upgrades to database when a new version of Infinity PFM is loaded.
First release of Infinity PFM.
